description:
dark wood stock, neck and rod; steel barrel; intricate, swirling, organic designs engraved on patchbox and trigger, trigger plate, trigger housing, lock and tang; 22 parts: .1: gun; .2: leather case for accessory case; .3: wood accessory case; .4: powder bottle, silver, with monogramed initials; .5: flat, round silver object with protrusion to hold 1 cap; .6: round, black tin case with caps inside, "RWS #1" in gold; .7: round wood box-patch box with linen patches; .8: round wood box with q-tips; .9: round wood box with steel wool; .10: screw driver in round metal box; .11 & .12: rod in 2 parts, 1 steel, 1 wood; .13 & .14: oval, black metal box with lubricant and cleaning cloth; .15: rectangular wood box with 5 metal bullet-shaped objects inside; .16: bullet mold; .17: green leather case with cleaning supplies inside; .18: brown leather case with wrench inside; .19: strap; .20 & .21: 2 black, wood-handled chisel-like tools; .22: metal rod with disc at end in cloth. 
Arms and Armor-Firearm
marks:
Signature, Mark

 Engraved on top of barrel: [STEPHEN P. ALEXANDER]
title: Percussion Rifle with Case and Accessories
